meanings.definition: Material made of pliable twigs, typically used for baskets or furniture.
meanings.sent1: The wicker basket held all the fruits neatly.
meanings.sent2: She sat on the wicker chair while reading a book.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten jumped into the wicker basket and got stuck.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a wicker basket, holding memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The wicker furniture creaked softly as she sat down.

meanings.definition: A piece of furniture made of wicker.
meanings.sent1: The wicker in the garden was perfect for relaxing.
meanings.sent2: They bought a new wicker set for their patio.
meanings.sent3: The wicker chair seemed to have a personality of its own.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt as fragile as a wicker chair in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The wicker furniture added a cozy touch to the room.

meanings.sent1: She learned to wicker baskets from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: He wickered a beautiful basket for his mother's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to wicker a small basket.
meanings.sent4: Her words wickered a tale of ancient traditions.
meanings.sent5: The craftsman skillfully wickered the intricate design.
